spread operator

ternary opeartors:- ternary operator used to shorten the if else statement.

syntax:- value if true ? value if false

anonyms function :- a function without a name is called anonyms function

they are mainly used when we want to pass a function as an argument to another function

a first class function is a function that treats functions as first class citizens

function number 4:: class function - in first class function to a variablean dwe are treating the variabale as a function

we can pass function inside another function as an argument,

it can return a function from a function

SELF INVOCKING function:- a function which invock itself is called self invocking function

syntax:- (function(){ code here })();

ADVANTAGES:- it dosen't interfare with other code ,

it dosen't pollute the global scope

Example:- (function(){ console.log("hello world") })();
